title: my pvp.net always hangs on champion select on both rank and normal games
body: Everytime I try to play rank, my champ select forzes and i cant do anyting until i realise that i have already left the room, had this problem for quite long time and cant even play rank anymore because of this. Help me fix this issues please anyone XX

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if anything helps.
